member.name: P:CaseManager.NewData.Case.ID
member.summary:
All entries that are editable by a user MUST have a default value assigned in the file - example: public string ID { get; set; }
= string.Empty; The "string.Empty" must exist so the JsonSerializer will create a valid, non-null entry

member.name: P:CaseManager.NewData.DetailedInformation.Parameters
member.summary: Key = identifier phrase like "modifications" (for car) Value = Json Serialized string of parameter
